Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Puerto de la Cruz, Apartamentos Be Smart Florida Plaza is in the historical district and minutes from Plaza del Charco and Ermita de San Juan. This apartment is within close proximity of Church of Nuestra Senora de la Pena de Francia and Risco Belle Aquatic Gardens.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 132 guestrooms, featuring kitchenettes. Rooms have private balconies. Cable television is provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy the recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool or make use of other amenities including wireless Internet access (surcharge).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, laundry facilities, and an elevator (lift).


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at Noon Check-out time is Noon

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Enjoy the recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool or make use of other amenities including wireless Internet access (surcharge).
Make yourself at home in one of the 132 guestrooms, featuring kitchenettes. Rooms have private balconies. Cable television is provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Located in Puerto de la Cruz, Apartamentos Be Smart Florida Plaza is in the historical district and minutes from Plaza del Charco and Ermita de San Juan. This apartment is within close proximity of Church of Nuestra Senora de la Pena de Francia and Risco Belle Aquatic Gardens.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Plaza del Charco - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Ermita de San Juan - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Church of Nuestra Senora de la Pena de Francia - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Risco Belle Aquatic Gardens - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Castillo San Felipe - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Garden Beach - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Taoro Park - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Sitio Litre Garden - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Casino Puerto de la Cruz - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Lago Martianez Swimming Pools - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Loro Parque - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Mirador de La Paz - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Botanical Garden of La Orotava - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Pueblo Chico - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Bollullo Beach - 3.3 km / 2 mi

The preferred airport for Apartamentos Be Smart Florida Plaza is Santa Cruz de Tenerife (TFN-Tenerife North) - 21.8 km / 13.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
